doc:
Corey Glover https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Corey_Glover 0 Corey Glover (born November 6, 1964) is an American singer, guitarist and actor. He is the lead vocalist of the rock band Living Colour and has toured as the vocalist for the funk band Galactic. As an actor, he played Francis in the 1986 war movie Platoon. Corey_Glover ( born November_6_,_1964 ) is an_American_singer , guitarist_and_actor . He is the_lead_vocalist of the_rock_band Living Colour and has_toured as the_vocalist for the_funk_band_Galactic . As an_actor , he played Francis in the_1986_war_movie_Platoon .
